Our country's athletes have achieved great results at the Chengdu Universiade and Hangzhou Asian Games. . These achievements are hard-won and exciting.

The vitality continues to increase, social expectations continue to improve, we will effectively prevent and resolve major risks, and strive to achieve the annual economic and social development goals. We must focus on promoting high-level opening up to the outside world, continue to comprehensively deepen reforms, steadily expand institutional opening up such as rules, regulations, management, and standards, promote the high-quality development of the "Belt and Road" initiative, smooth the domestic and international dual cycles, and make economic development more efficient. ;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that we must continue to comprehensively, accurately and unswervingly implement the "one country, two systems" policy, implement the principles of "patriots governing Hong Kong" and "patriots governing Macao", and support Hong Kong and Macao in developing their economies and improving people's livelihood. , give full play to its own characteristics and advantages, actively participate in the construction of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, and maintain the long-term prosperity and stability of Hong Kong and Macao. Friendship forever.

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 28th   (Reporter Yang Yijun) On the afternoon of September 28, President Xi Jinping met with Azoulay, Director-General of UNESCO, at the Great Hall of the People.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that the cooperation between China and UNESCO is very meaningful and is conducive to jointly promoting world peace and development. Over the years, China has always supported the work of UNESCO and, together with UNESCO, has done many positive things to safeguard world peace and promote global development. This kind of cooperation is very precious and should be maintained for a long time. The world is made up of rich and colorful civilizations, and China is one of the countries with the oldest history and culture in the world. China is willing to cooperate more closely with UNESCO to continuously improve the capacity and level of heritage protection, promote exchanges, mutual learning and inclusive cooperation among various civilizations, contribute to world peace, and promote the building of a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China has a population of more than 1.4 billion, and the tremendous development China has achieved is itself an important contribution to the progress of human civilization. China is committed to building a comprehensive and powerful modern socialist country by the middle of this century and promoting the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation with Chinese-style modernization. To this end, China adheres to the strategy of rejuvenating the country through science and education, actively promotes the development of education, science and technology, and cultural undertakings, and attaches great importance to international exchanges and cooperation with the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization and other parties. China is willing to work with UNESCO to contribute to promoting common global development.

;

;Azulay said that the Chinese government has always attached great importance to and actively supported the work of UNESCO. China supports the establishment of the UNESCO Girls and Women’s Education Award, which has played an important role in promoting women and girls’ education around the world. . UNESCO is satisfied with the many important consensuses and good cooperation with China in a wide range of fields, and hopes to further strengthen exchanges and cooperation with China in the fields of cultural heritage protection and science, culture, technology, etc., to build more international consensus and contribute to safeguarding the world's make positive contributions to peace and development.

;

;Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 28  Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, State President, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, recently Important instructions on the work of women and children pointed out that the cause of women and children is an important part of the cause of the party and the country. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party’s leadership on women and children’s work has been comprehensively strengthened, the legal system for protecting the rights and interests of women and children has been continuously improved, the development environment for women and children has been continuously optimized and improved, the international voice and influence in the field of women and children have been significantly enhanced, and the cause of women and children has been significantly strengthened. In parallel with economic and social development, the development path of women and children under socialism with Chinese characteristics is getting wider and wider.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that in promoting the great cause of building a strong country and national rejuvenation, women are an important force and children are the new force in the future. Party committees and governments at all levels must deepen their understanding of the importance of developing women's and children's undertakings and doing a good job in women's and children's work, adhere to the basic national policy of gender equality and the priority development of children, thoroughly implement the outline for the development of women and children, improve the comprehensive quality of women and children, and actively provide services for women and children. Women's participation in economic and social development creates conditions and builds a platform to protect the legitimate rights and interests of women and children, and strive to make respect for women and care for children a common practice throughout society. It is hoped that the majority of women and children workers will adhere to their original mission, carry forward the spirit of struggle, work with sincerity and sincerity, and make greater efforts to promote women to be at the forefront of the times, children to thrive, and to promote the high-quality development of women and children's undertakings. contribute.

;

;The Seventh National Work Conference on Women and Children was held in Beijing on the 28th. Important instructions from Xi Jinping were conveyed at the meeting. Li Qiang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council, attended the meeting and delivered a speech.

;

;Li Qiang pointed out in his speech that General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions fully affirmed the major achievements in the development of women and children’s causes since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, and are very important for promoting the high-quality development of women’s and children’s causes in the new era and new journey. It puts forward clear requirements and places ardent expectations on the majority of women and children's workers. It has a strong political, ideological and guiding nature and points out the direction for doing a good job in women and children's work. We must study and understand in depth and implement it conscientiously.

;

;Li Qiang pointed out that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping has made a series of important expositions on doing a good job in women and children's work and promoting the development of women and children's causes from the perspective of the overall development of the party and the country, and proposed a series of new The new ideas and new judgments have further deepened our party's understanding of the regularity of the development of women and children's causes, and provided fundamental compliance and action guidelines for doing a good job in the work of women and children in the new era and new journey. We must deeply understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments", achieve "two safeguards", thoroughly understand General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions and important expositions on women and children's work, adhere to the basic national policy of gender equality and the priority development of children, and fully Taking into account the actual differences between the sexes and the special interests of women and children, we should take more powerful and effective measures to promote the all-round development of women and children, and promote the protection of the rights and interests of women and children, a more colorful life, and a happier life.

;

;Li Qiang emphasized that we should focus on the in-depth implementation of the Chinese Women's Development Program and the Chinese Children's Development Program, do a solid job in key tasks for women and children, vigorously support the majority of women in establishing their careers, strive to implement the principle of giving priority to children, and improve support The policy system for family construction protects the legitimate rights and interests of women and children. It is necessary to uphold the party's overall leadership, give full play to the important role of women's federations and other mass organizations, further create a good social environment, gather strong work force, and continuously create a new era and new journey for the high-quality development of women and children's undertakings.

;

;State Councilor and Director of the State Council Working Committee on Women and Children Chen Yiqin pointed out in his concluding speech that it is necessary to effectively unify thoughts and actions to the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions, implement the requirements of Premier Li Qiang’s speech, and give full play to the broad masses of The advantages and roles of women can more effectively strengthen the care and protection of minors, effectively safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of women and children, improve the level of health services for women and children, implement them with heart and soul, and strive to create a new situation for the high-quality development of women and children's undertakings.

;

;The meeting commended advanced collectives and advanced individual representatives across the country for implementing the Outline for the Development of Women and Children. Relevant responsible comrades from the National Development and Reform Commission, the Ministry of Public Security, the National Health Commission, Shanghai Municipality, Hubei Province, Guangdong Province, and Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region made exchange speeches.

;

;Wu Zhenglong and Shen Yueyue attended the meeting.

;

;The meeting was held in the form of a video conference call. Deputy directors and members of the Women and Children's Working Committee of the State Council, responsible comrades from provinces, autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, and relevant departments of the central and state agencies attended the meeting.

; Fri, 29 Sep 2023 05:56:03 +0800 02版要闻 - 坚持着眼长远、打牢基础http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20230929_7-02.htm
;Friday, September 29, 2023
; ;

;The more ambitious the goal, the more strategic thinking and long-term vision must be improved; the more arduous the task, the more solid development must be foundation and lay a solid foundation for the business. Recently, General Secretary Xi Jinping put forward clear requirements for establishing a correct view of political performance during his inspection in Zhejiang, emphasizing the need to "adhere to a long-term perspective and lay a solid foundation." This has great guiding significance for promoting Chinese-style modernization and doing a solid job in various tasks.

;

;Those who do not plan for the eternity cannot plan for a moment. Our party is determined to achieve the eternal great cause of the Chinese nation, grasp the relationship between the current and the long-term, and grasp the relationship between potential and apparent achievements. This is an inevitable requirement for establishing a correct view of political performance and creating new achievements. Since the new era, we have planned and constructed Xiongan New Area with the spirit of a thousand-year plan, promoted the construction of ecological civilization from the perspective of sustainable development, and comprehensively promoted rural revitalization with a long-term determination... We have always insisted on planning for future generations and long-term development. , our party united and led the people to accomplish many major and important matters of long-term importance. The goals and tasks set by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China include short-term, medium-term and long-term goals. It is necessary to make comprehensive progress while also highlighting key points, and to focus on the present while focusing on the long term, so as to turn the grand blueprint into reality.对于广大党员干部而言，为官一任、造福一方，既要做显功，也要做潜功，既要做让老百姓看得见、摸得着、得实惠的实事，也要做为后人作铺垫、打基础、利长远的好事，才能创造经得起历史和人民检验的实绩。

;

;着眼长远，就要发扬“功成不必在我、功成必定有我”的精神。眼光放得长远，大势才能看得清，问题才能看得准，方向才能辨得明。对党员干部来说，有什么样的大局观、长远观、整体观，就有什么样的胸襟气度和处事格局。前进道路上，要善于从全局、长远、大势上作出判断和决策，放眼长远认真研究，不断增强工作的科学性、预见性、主动性、创造性。要牢牢把握高质量发展这个首要任务和构建新发展格局这个战略任务，处理好稳和进、立和破、虚和实、标和本、近和远的关系，自觉把新发展理念贯穿到经济社会发展全过程。要克服急功近利、急于求成的想法，坚持一张蓝图绘到底，对已有的部署和规划，只要是科学的、切合新的实践要求的、符合人民群众愿望的，就要坚持，一茬接着一茬干，一件事接着一件事办好。

;

;打牢基础，就要多谋长远之策，多行固本之举。基础不牢，地动山摇。无论是夯实农业强国这个社会主义现代化强国的根基，还是逐步实现全体人民共同富裕，无论是实现高质量发展和高水平安全的良性互动，还是加快构建新发展格局，这些目标任务事关长远、事关全局，不可能一蹴而就，必须保持历史耐心、不遗余力推进。广大党员干部要胸怀“国之大者”，坚持打牢基础，不能操之过急、盲目蛮干，不搞竭泽而渔、劳民伤财，既要做好当前工作，又要为今后发展做好衔接。不折不扣贯彻落实党中央决策部署，发扬求真务实、真抓实干的作风，坚持稳中求进、循序渐进、持续推进，以钉钉子精神担当尽责，在抓落实上取得新实效，定能夯实我国经济发展的根基、增强发展的安全性稳定性，牢牢掌握我国发展主动权。

;

;习近平总书记强调：“树立和践行正确政绩观，起决定性作用的是党性。只有党性坚强、摒弃私心杂念，才能保证政绩观不出偏差。”新征程上，我们要牢记为民造福是最大政绩，把为老百姓做了多少好事实事作为检验政绩的重要标准，始终坚持着眼长远、打牢基础，既谋划长远，又干在当下，在推进中国式现代化进程中不断实现人民对美好生活的向往、不断创造新的更大奇迹。
